root.name: POD: Planet of Death
root.description: An expansion pack called POD: Back to Hell was also released, including 8 extra cars and 16 more tracks. Another version called POD: Gold was later released which included POD, its expansion, plus a new sound set. Good Old Games released a version of POD which can run on modern computers and Holger Bredel has posted instructions to get the original pod to run on modern computers on his blog.
